column5: You will get a first overview about advanced functionalities of the OTRS ticket system
column6: Basic idea of a process tickets: a more efficient workflow handling
column7: You as the Customer</br>- Login with each (different) customer user dedicated to a product of the company</br>- Create for each and all process tickets</br></br>You as the Agent</br>- find the corresponding tickets</br>- process the tickets with the required agents until process activity 'Completed'. You can move on to the last step after you've done wit all different procceses. Check the internal workflow with the admin agent in the process managment area to clearly see the difference in handling.
